このマターボードをセットすることで、ロビーにいる

"You can advance forward by clearing
a specific quest.

In the \"Route Unlock Requirements\" window,
you can check what quest to complete by checking
under \"Quest Name\".

※If the quest is not listed in your selectable
quests, then you will need to unlock the
quest first before you can complete the requirements."
